website_summaries.verdict: Novelty factor aside, at less than $50, the kid-friendly Porkfolio feels like a justifiable splurge -- and a good gift, too.
pros: The Quirky Porkfolio counts your coins as promised and boasts one of the best smart home apps that we've seen
cons: Not all of the features worked, and some seemed a bit silly anyways

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a smart home automation device to replace the coffee mug that sits on my counter with change in it. I used to walk past it constantly and wonder to myself "how much is actually in there". Now with this electronic piggy bank, my change is tallied as I deposit it. I know what your thinking "but don't you have to wait till it's full and use all the money at once?" While emptying bank is the easiest option in the app for withdrawaling from the Ballance, the app will give you the option to withdraw a select amount.
customer_reviews.author: koman90

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We love this little guy! I did have trouble connecting it to my phone at first. I called Wink and he walked me through the setup. My phone's brightness was turned down and needed to be turned up. Ever since then I have had no problem and my kids love to hunt for change so they can watch Porkie's nose light up!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Deni

customer_reviews.title: Unwanted “quirks”
customer_reviews.text: This product is fun but has some little “quirks” that aren’t easy to fix. Getting this to connect to my smart hub was not easy. It took far longer than expected. Once it is connected it counts your money great. I struggled when money was taken out to reset the product which was a viscous cycle of trying to reset and reprogram it again. Fun but not very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Glaske

customer_reviews.title: it took me a good 15 tries
customer_reviews.text: Takes a huge amount of effort to setup because there is some sort of problem with the firmware this ships with and the pairing procedure is very precise with when you need to pull the batteries/etc. it took me a good 15 tries, hard resetting each time, before I got it to go on my wifi network. Check around on other comments for install instructions. It's still difficult even with them :)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: and love to tinker
customer_reviews.text: This should probably never made it to market. Nearly impossible to join to network, and removing the head to reset is utterly impossible without superhuman strength and a pry bar! After finally getting those two tasks complete, it stopped reporting the money amount about a week later. Sent it back. I'm a tech geek, and love to tinker, but this was too much of a hassle to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Geekster

customer_reviews.title: Not very smart when it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: After trying for hours, no luck in getting this thing to connect with the app. I've emailed support, but if just getting the thing to work is this much trouble, they've already failed with this product. It's doesn't deliver on its basic promises, and isn't worth the frustration or effort required to take advantage of the features.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this again
customer_reviews.text: this thing was extremely hard to add to my network. I had to call wink and found out there are secrets to getting this to pair with the wink hub. Thankfully wink offered support on this even though it is not their product which is awesome since quirky is no longer in business. I bought two other quirky products before realizing this although they paired easily and work well I also bought the egg minder and a power strip.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Works, but requires some work
customer_reviews.text: Okay... yes. It was difficult to get to connect. But once I did, it works perfectly. The instructions in Wink even suggest that you take the battery out after you "flash" the Porkfolio. This did end up working for me, and it connected fine. A little challenging to take off the nose. I used a flat head screwdriver and it worked fine. For $12 I can't really complain!
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone and she loved it! it's easy to use, you can also put bills in there and just type it into the app to say that you are putting a dollar amount in there which is great. The only problem is that you will have to make sure to put the dollar amount through the bottom or it may register as another coin since it counts the change based on the size of the coin,
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Do you need it no, but you must buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the strangest thing I think I have ever purchased, I love it. It's bigger than I thought which I like. It does exactly what It claims. But combined with IFTTT.com it does so much more it is cool to have the lights blink when you add coins. It would be great for kids.
customer_reviews.author: HS Tulsa

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of conversation (and fun)
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, kind of difficult to set-up, confusing documentation. Anyway, we could make it work after many attempts, pairing it with an Android and an iPhone. An electronics engineer and a software developer struggled to not send the device back as a lemon... :) It was fun, because we didn't have irrealistic expectations. It could be a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Radu

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: Omg, please dont buy this POS. Worthless other than being able to use it like any other piggy bank on the market. The app doesnt work.doesnt link to it...also stopped working all together aftwr about 3 weeks. I spent 17 bucks on a plastic bank. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: Yasi

customer_reviews.title: Great concept- when it works
customer_reviews.text: Great concept- when it works. On many occasions it does not recognize the coins being inserted so I've resorted to pulling off the head (no small feat) to remove the batteries and reset. Seems to have stabilized with the last software upgrade but I don't truly expect an exact counting of the coins deposited. Plus side, I didn't really buy it for that.
customer_reviews.author: CEL

customer_reviews.title: I loved that Pig
customer_reviews.text: Piggie died a premature death. Then I took it apart and discovered a loose wire. It worked again for a while, then died again 1 month later. It was very frustrating to deal with, and I don't handle that well. That's a shame too, I loved that Pig.
customer_reviews.author: Ragnar Danneskjöld

customer_reviews.title: App needs to be compatible with more devices
customer_reviews.text: Very cute product. If I had known that I couldn't download the app for my tablet (Kindle Fire HDX 8.9) or my iPod touch (it's an older model), then I would not have purchased it. I wish I could use it, but I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Crincic

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Pulled the tab on accident, before syncing with the app and now it is broken. Will not work with the Wink App no matter what we've tried. Now it's just a regular piggy bank. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S

customer_reviews.title: A-w-full, plain and simple
customer_reviews.text: 1 star for a bright idea and patient tech support. The rest is just awful, and this is coming for a tenacious tech guy. 20 setups, 3 tech support threads, failed and failed setups and when after 6 months it finally connected a month later it's no longer working. Extreme frustration and disappointment for kids
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan

customer_reviews.title: 😡😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to pair with the wink app. Then I finally got it paired and thought it was all good. When I tried to subtract money in the app I constantly got a "500 internal error". I ended up calling Wink support and there was not much they could help me with. I was informed that the company that manufacture this product went out of business and they wouldn't be unable to send me a new product as there is no warranty n any of these products.
customer_reviews.author: M. Downs

customer_reviews.title: Overall not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I like quirky. Fun for my young daughter to want to save and watch her money add up with out dumping it out and losing some of it every so often. Paper bills have to be placed in then added manually to the app. 50 cent peices register as 1.00 so watch for that if using those. Overall pretty much what I was expecting really.
customer_reviews.author: glenmoormax

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Hard to connect to installation. Why why make light sense to connect? I can't understand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Broken
customer_reviews.text: It is incredibly difficult to connect the Porkfolio to your WiFi network, and it fails to maintain a connection for more than a week. The Wink app suggests several workarounds that feel like an acknowledgment of the failure of the product, including, strangely, removing the batteries from the device right after pairing. Although the premise is nice, I cannot recommend purchasing the Porkfolio because it is a fundamentally broken product.
customer_reviews.author: Cory French

customer_reviews.title: Very good product took a little fuzz to connect had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product took a little fuzz to connect had to remove some parts to reset it wish they put a reset button outside but overall working as it should
customer_reviews.author: Steve T.

customer_reviews.title: He'll be headless forever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the cute factor but it quickly became a burden. It would constantly disconnect from my WiFi network (Apple Airport Extreme) even though my SSID isn't hidden. After many attempts with support they recommended I force a reset by removing Porkfolio's head and removing the batteries. Removing the head was EXTREMELY difficult and now it is IMPOSSIBLE to reattach!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Oink-oink!!
customer_reviews.text: Novelty item but it does an okay job at counting coins. Wink app has a hard time with it at times and goes offline but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Schpeen

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Even worse that not functioning... it functioned great.. and my girlfriend loved it... for 1 night. Then, nothing. Called Wink, and they informed me the product NEVER worked correctly. Now, she's heartbroken.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald P Edens

customer_reviews.title: Does not work..
customer_reviews.text: Does not work.. I spent a lot of time trying to get it to connect to my Wifi, but it would not. I am a computer programmer, so I kinda know what I am doing when it comes to networks/wifi. It has now been over 30 days since i bought the product (I spent a week, just trying to make it work, cause I really wanted it) and so now, I can't even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Hightitude

customer_reviews.title: sort of cool if you have a wink relay because you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 2 yr old son. its nothing to special but it works as advertised and has a mobile app to keep track of what money is in the bank as well as setting goals. its also compatiable with Wink. sort of cool if you have a wink relay because you can then view the balance from any of your relay touchscreens as well as your mobie app.
customer_reviews.author: Kiba

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time synchronizing this with a phone that was 3 years old. Would not recommend this product. Tech support was great but still not working.
customer_reviews.author: tierney

customer_reviews.title: Quirky describes how this product really works.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but not so great execution...Quirky describes how this product really works. By the time you figure this out it'll be too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: UBCalm

customer_reviews.title: Took a little time to set up but once it ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a little time to set up but once it was done. My youngest loves it. Get way to teach him how to save
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: She downloaded the app fine but it would never work for her
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a birthday gift to my nephew, but no matter how much my sister researched and tried she said they were never able to link her Iphone to the piggy bank. She downloaded the app fine but it would never work for her, so it's just like any other regular piggy bank, it sits there and you can drop change or money in it and that is it. Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit except I cant get it to link up
customer_reviews.author: Charles F.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Software doesn't work. Still was cheap enough to use as a standalone piggy Bank
customer_reviews.author: ssmall

customer_reviews.title: I couln't set up, i have to take to ...
customer_reviews.text: I couln't set up, i have to take to 606 West 28th street see if they help me to set up.
customer_reviews.author: ibella2013

customer_reviews.title: Works. What else can I say. After a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works. What else can I say. After a few days of trail and error we have been sleep terror free for well over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky guy

customer_reviews.title: Likes to disconnect
customer_reviews.text: I have had to reconnect to the app twice now. It's fun to use when it works but seems to have a lot of connectivity issues. The head is VERY hard to get off for when you have to reconnect.
customer_reviews.author: chris b

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Pair
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, however, the app is very glitchy. Without the app, this is pointless. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rissa

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: This is pure trash, I’m appalled that amazon would allow this garbage to be sold here. It does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Madmike

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far after about 20 tries, I can't get it to sync with my phone app
customer_reviews.author: Judye Furlow

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: What a major pain in the a$$. Could not connect it to my wink network. Contacted support who was not helpful at all. Ended up sending it back. Will not be repurchasing
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Thought the ap to give it accounting capability was over ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought the ap to give it accounting capability was over priced; so it is basically a piggy bank
customer_reviews.author: drdancer

customer_reviews.title: Much like all of the quirky devices
customer_reviews.text: Fast transaction. Much like all of the quirky devices, they are finnicky getting connected to Wink if using an Android. Had to use an iPad mini
customer_reviews.author: Matt Case

customer_reviews.title: may not be ready for prime time yet
customer_reviews.text: have not been able to get the bank to see our wy-fi network???? gonna give it a second try though.
customer_reviews.author: Bytet

customer_reviews.title: Was a little hard to set up initially, called ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hard to set up initially, called wink and they walked me through the process. Product works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy. Just couldn't get this particular one to work.
customer_reviews.author: JWSpoon

customer_reviews.title: 4 months and then GONE for good!
customer_reviews.text: 4 months of usage and it was gone! No where to be found a support for warranty replacement / repair.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Useless - will not connect
customer_reviews.text: This will not connect no matter what I do. Absolutely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love with it
customer_reviews.text: It took me at least an hour to figure it out but when I did, I fell in love with it. Let me just say that I wouldn't have been able to set this thing up if it weren't for the nice folks who took the time out to right such helpful reviews. Thank you guys! If you get this bad boy make sure you guys scroll through these reviews. It will save you a lot of time! P.s my sensor doesn't work :( thats the only reason why I gave it a 3 star ***UPDATE**** THE SENSOR WORKS!! Wohoo! 5 stars baby, five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The world's greatest Internet connected piggy bank!
customer_reviews.text: How could you not love this pig? It might not be too easy to pair it up but once you have completed the simple instructions you can connect to the internet and the app. With the Wink app you can write IfTTT recipes and turn on your smart lights or change their colors when your kids add money to the bank. I can't wait to see more features added so we can watch the nose change colors when we pull eggs out of the egg minder.
customer_reviews.author: Dan German

customer_reviews.title: Purposeful, but not performing, pig
customer_reviews.text: Hard to set up and all features do not work.
customer_reviews.author: Monon

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice for it to relay to you what is going ...
customer_reviews.text: Works once you get it connected, but connecting it is a battle that can last for a few hours. Once connected, it works as advertised. Would be nice for it to relay to you what is going on other than just flashing that it isn't working to help with troubleshooting.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H.

customer_reviews.title: "Porkfolios" from DealFisher
customer_reviews.text: These "Porkfolios" were gifts and they made a huge hit! Makes saving money for kids really fun.
customer_reviews.author: Romelle G. Bond

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it but....
customer_reviews.text: This Piggy Bank was, in concept, not only cute but would have been one of my more functional nic nacs I've bought recently. However, it doesn't work... At all. I tried for longer than I care to admit to connect this thing and I did everything I could think of to connect it and nothing. I don't know if I have a defective pig or not because it sounds like most people have issues with it. I would easily give this 5 stars had it worked but alas it now just collects dust on a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Chubb

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the idea of this
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the idea of this, but the reality is not that great. The piggie often doesn't "read" change when I put it in, and the app is very glitchy. With improvements, it would be fantastic though. The pig is cute and and the idea is great, especially for kids. I still like it, just wish it wasn't so glitchy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J. Dukart

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks it never worked & unless you are a bodybuilder you cannot get the head off of this pig to put the batteries in...I was so excited when this arrived but it was so frustrating that I threw it away...make site your product works before you sell it...I would not recommend this product...I would have given it zero stars but that isn't an option
customer_reviews.author: Rose B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Junk, put it away and did not touch it again
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bieber

customer_reviews.title: Three different phones, two different routers, and it still doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I am a computer programmer by trade so it pains me when simple products like this don't work. It is supposed to be configured via a series of flashing lights from your Android or iOS phone but nothing I did would make it work and since it has no feedback (other than a flashing light) one has no means of knowing what could possibly be wrong with it. I tried unsuccessfully with two Android 4.0+ and one iPhone 5s and nothing would get it to connect to either of my wireless routers. The concept is good but the implementation is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L

customer_reviews.title: It's so cute but unfortunately it doesn't work. We ...
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute but unfortunately it doesn't work. We bought it, returned because it was broke and brought it again and the second one was broke too. Such a shame. No wonder quirky went out of business.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Salomon

customer_reviews.title: Creepy Pig
customer_reviews.text: Will absolutely not connect to my wink system no app for a Samsung Galaxy Note 4 5 or 6 not worth the price and does not look like anything on the pictures it is kind of creepy looking
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Shively

customer_reviews.title: No iOS8 Support yet
customer_reviews.text: The app that makes the toy fun doesn't run on iOS8. Without the app its just an expensive piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Uwe H Palm

customer_reviews.title: Cute love that it hooks up to my phone so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute love that it hooks up to my phone so I can see how much in have in it.
customer_reviews.author: michael bujanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun idea for saving your loose change. I have a Wink hub that this is synced to and it’s fun being able to see how much money we’ve saved up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Quirky PPORK-WH01 E-PPORK-WH01/1 Porkfolio Smart Piggy Bank, White, 9.5 x 5.5 x 10 inches
product_meta.description: Color Name:WhitePorkfolio is the world"s smartest piggy bank. It wirelessly connects to an app on your mobile device so you can track your balance and set financial goals from afar. Its nose lights up in celebration every time a U.S. coin is inserted and it holds up to $100 in quarters (cha ching!).
feature_bullets: A piggy bank that syncs with an app that allows you to check your balance and set goals. It"s a full-on financial institution!
Alerts are triggered by Porkfolio"s built-in accelerometer to protect your savings from shenanigans. All you"ll have to worry about is bringing home the bacon.
While Porkfolio is adult friendly, it really shines when teaching the lil" ones about money and responsibility. Piggy banks are way more fun when the Internet"s inside.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.5 out of 5 stars121 ratings2.5 out of 5 stars
